rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with a minimalistic Art Deco style entrance featuring geometric patterns and streamlined fixtures.

rooms.name: Living Area & Kitchen Open Plan
rooms.description: An open-plan living area merged with the kitchen, designed in an Art Deco style with elegant finishes, bold colors, and modern, efficient appliances. The layout maximizes space by incorporating modular furniture and multifunctional storage.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious bedroom tailored for a bachelor pad, featuring a central Vastu-compliant position with ample natural light and Art Deco elements such as geometric wall art and streamlined fixtures.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Adjacent to the bedroom, this bathroom is designed with practical fixtures, minimalistic decor following Art Deco aesthetics, and efficient water usage systems to adhere to budget constraints.

openings.description: A well-structured entrance door with Art Deco detailing that aligns with the farmhouse's facade, ensuring secure access.
Large, strategically placed windows in the living area and bedroom to enhance natural light while preserving privacy; designed with classic geometric patterns as per Vastu guidelines.

courtyard.description: A central open courtyard serving as a serene focal point for relaxation and ventilation, incorporating local landscaping techniques and Art Deco styled seating arrangements.
